---
title: Editorial workflow
---

- check spelling for correctness and consistency
- check grammar (verbâ€“subject agreement, dangling participles, incorrect or unclear use of pronouns, etc.) and punctuation for correctness and consistency.
- ensure that text ties up with information in tables and figures, and that bibliographic citations in the text match the reference list.
- check that tables, figures and annexes are correctly cited in the text.
- ensure that all cross-references to chapters, sections and subsections are correct.
- check formatting of chapters, sections, subsections, paragraphs for consistency.
- ensure that essential abbreviations are spelled out at first mention.
- check that word usage is appropriate.
- delete excessive italic, boldface and quotation marks.
- edit chapter titles, subheadings and table and figure legends for brevity, consistency and parallel construction, and check numbering.
- monitor paragraph length and content. eliminate verbatim repetition of text, tables or figures and cut out redundant passages.

Return only the edited text.
